nodes.text: A male Mandalorian died from suffocation due to an allergic reaction to Blisterbug venom. Although his chest started to swell, he refused to remove the breastplate as he believed it would insult his honor. Ro-San Borokki witnessed his death, and noted in her chapter "The Hunt" in The Bounty Hunter Code that the Mandalorian died from "stubbornness".
The mandalorian was briefly mentioned in The Bounty Hunter Code: From the Files of Boba Fett which was released on October 15, 2013 and written by Daniel Wallace, Ryder Windham and Jason Fry.
The Bounty Hunter Code: From the Files of Boba Fett (First mentioned)
